greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sum of cubes of primes dividing n.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: G.f.: Sum_{k>=1} prime(k)^3*x^prime(k)/(1 - x^prime(k)). - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Dec 24 2016
Dirichlet g.f.: primezeta(s-3)*zeta(s). - _Benedict W. J. Irwin_, Jul 11 2018
program: def a(n): return sum(p**3 for p in primefactors(n))
print([a(n) for n in range(1, 101)]) # _Indranil Ghosh_, Jul 11 2017
(PARI) a(n) = my(f=factor(n)); sum(k=1, #f~, f[k,1]^3); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Jul 11 2017
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
